movie.title: We Are Your Friends
movie.description_intro: Cole is an aspiring DJ who spends his days scheming with his childhood friends and his nights working on the one track that will set the world on fire. All of this changes when he meets a charismatic but damaged older DJ named James, who takes him under his wing. Things get complicated, however, when Cole starts falling for James' much younger girlfriend, Sophie. With Cole's forbidden relationship intensifying and his friendships unraveling, he must choose between love, loyalty, and the future he is destined for.
movie.description_full: Cole is an aspiring DJ who spends his days scheming with his childhood friends and his nights working on the one track that will set the world on fire. All of this changes when he meets a charismatic but damaged older DJ named James, who takes him under his wing. Things get complicated, however, when Cole starts falling for James' much younger girlfriend, Sophie. With Cole's forbidden relationship intensifying and his friendships unraveling, he must choose between love, loyalty, and the future he is destined for.

movies.title: Gamemaster
movies.summary: A deep dive into the world of the thriving board game industry and the creators behind popular games.
movies.description_full: A deep dive into the world of the thriving board game industry and the creators behind popular games.
movies.synopsis: A deep dive into the world of the thriving board game industry and the creators behind popular games.

movies.title: Yellow Rose
movies.summary: Rose, an undocumented 17 year old Filipina, dreams of one day leaving her small Texas town to pursue her country music dreams. Her world is shattered when her mom suddenly gets picked up by Immigration and Customs Enforcement. Rose, facing this new realty, is forced to flee the scene, leaving behind the only life she knows, and embarks on a journey of self-discovery as she searches for a new home in the honky tonk world of Austin, Texas.

movies.title: Jane Fonda in Five Acts
movies.summary: A look at the life, work, activism and controversies of actress and fitness tycoon, Jane Fonda.

movies.title: Free Rein Valentine's Day
movies.summary: Love is in the air as Zoe and friends go on a quest to find a fabled Maid's Stone. But when rivalry blinds them to danger, it's Raven to the rescue.
